=================================
Welcome to pylam's documentation!
=================================

**pylam** is a python library for working with *in* and *out put* files
for, respectively generated by `LAMMPS`_ the *Large-scale Atomic/Molecular Massively Parallel Simulator*.

.. note:: The author is not not affiliated with Steve Plimpton nor Department of Energy!
